attributes.action: Closure of the country, restrictions on all movements, inbound isolation 14 days
attributes.additional_details: Right decision will be the good opportunity for UK new government to prove in the worldwide UK have capable of turning round  and also proving Brexit is a good decision. The new government should lead the British people working together.
attributes.background: There will be a heavy blow to UK people life, economy,  and medical system under dual of Brexit and Coronavirus. calling UK new government to seek medical supplies and humanitarian assistance from China.
